material.note: Material 601: carbon buffer Porous carbon buffer, AGR-2 specification, density 1.0 g/cm3 Assumed to contain 3 ppm natural boron impurity XS temperature taken as 1200 K (900 C)
Material 602: pyrolitic graphite Inner and outer pyrolitic graphite, AGR-2 specification, density 1.87 g/cm3 Assumed to contain 3 ppm natural boron impurity XS temperature taken as 1200 K (900 C)
Material 603: graphite block Toyo Tanso IG-110 specification, density 1.75 g/cm3 Assumed to contain 3 ppm natural boron impurity XS temperature taken as 1200 K (900 C)
Material 604: graphite matrix Graphite matrix material of compact, AGR-2 specification, density 1.59 g/cm3 Assumed to contain 3 ppm natural boron impurity XS temperature taken as 1200 K (900 C)

Material 901: salt coolant Baseline design NaF-ZrF4 salt coolant (NaF 59.5 mol%, ZrF4 40.5 mol%) ZrF4 limited to ~40% mol fraction to limit vapor pressure of binary salt melt XS temperature taken as 900 K (600 C)
Material 1401: silicon carbide SiC layer, AGR-2 specification, density 3.2 g/cm3 Assumed to contain 3 ppm natural boron impurity XS temperature taken as 1200 K (900 C)

Material 9201: fuel UCO fuel k350nel, AGR-2 specification, 19.5 a% U-235 enriched Note that oxygen approximated as 100% O-16 Kernel assumed to contain 3 ppm natural boron impurity XS temperature taken as 1200 K (original 1500 K)
